docs.lead_paragraph: NEW YORK has the only fish hospital in the world. It has its surgeons and its physicians, its wards and its operating tables. All diseases that the members of the finny tribe are heirs to are scientifically and successfully treated, and thorough investigation and research are made into some of the unknown diseases with which the piscatorial family is afflicted.

headline.main: THE ONLY FISH HOSPITAL, IN THE WORLD.; How the Finny Fellows Are Cured of Their Ills -- Surgery and Massage.
